properties.entry: SELECT CARD_NAME /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#selectCard() */ , CARD_NUMBER FROM CARD WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ?

SELECT ADDRESS_CODE /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#selectAddress() */ , ADDRESS_MAIN , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_PHONE , ADDRESS_NAME , ADDRESS_MESSAGE FROM ADDRESS WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#updateMember() */ MEMBER SET MEM_USER_NAME = ? , MEM_USER_SSN = ? , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#updatePwd() */ MEMBER SET MEM_USER_PWD = ? , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ? AND MEM_USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ? AND MEM_USER_PWD = ?

INSERT /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#insertCard() */ INTO CARD ( CARD_NO , MEM_USER_NO , CARD_NAME , CARD_NUMBER , CARD_VALIDATE , CARD_MEM_BIRTH , CARD_PWD , CARDINFO_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 )

INSERT /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#insertAddress() */ INTO ADDRESS ( ADDRESS_NO , MEM_USER_NO , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS_MAIN , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_PHONE , ADDRESS_NAME , ADDRESS_BASIC , ADDRESS_MESSAGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ADDRESSNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_BANKNAME = ? , MEM_ACCOUNT_NUM = ? , MEM_ACCOUNTHOLDER = ? , MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_USER_ID = ?
UPDATE /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#updateModifyDate() */ MEMBER SET MEM_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ?
SELECT /* com.LetsResell.myPage.model.dao.MyPage_dao#selectWishlistCount() */ COUNT(*) WISHLISTCOUNT FROM WISHLIST WHERE WISHLIST_MCODE = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT WISHLIST_ADD_DATE , PR_NAME FROM WISHLIST WISH JOIN P_REG ON (WISHLIST_PCODE=PR_NO) WHERE WISHLIST_MCODE = ? ORDER BY WISHLIST_ADD_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
